excerpt: A recovering alcoholic ex-cop turned department store Santa discovers a teenage girl is the unwilling pawn in a Neo-Nazi plot to revive the Third Reich by having her impregnated by a demonic two-foot-tall elf.
title: Elves

excerpt: A sexually frustrated high school student struggles with his attraction to his new substitute teacher while a serial killer preys on the female student body—but nobody seems to mind because the football team keeps winning.
title: Pretty Maids All in a Row

excerpt: An elite assassin carves a bloody path of revenge through her former squad to her ultimate target: her ex-lover and boss, Bill.
title: Kill Bill: The Whole Bloody Affair

excerpt: Saddled with a bank-mandated accountant and publicist, traveling circus owner Victor Mature tries to keep his show afloat and ferret out a deadly saboteur.
title: The Big Circus

excerpt: Duane and his deformed, surgically-separated conjoined twin Belial find refuge in a home for “unique individuals” until a nosy reporter threatens to ruin everything.
title: Basket Case 2
